item.title: Your House - Official Release Date Trailer
item.description: Your House is a narrative puzzle-thriller developed by Patrones & Escondites. Don't miss the official release date trailer here.

item.title: Brickadia - Steam Next Fest Demo Trailer
item.description: Brickadia is a brick-building game that is coming soon to Steam Early Access. Watch the official Steam Next Fest demo trailer here.

item.title: Unblock - Official Announcement Trailer
item.description: Don't miss the official announcement trailer for Unblock, an isometric platformer developed by 906 Games.

item.title: Parcel Simulator - Official Gameplay Trailer
item.description: Process and inspect packages in Dansan Digital's Parcel Simulator, which lets players build a business empire. See the official gameplay trailer here.

item.title: Machine Mind - Official Gameplay Trailer
item.description: Machine Mind is a post-apocalyptic action game developed by Chudo-Yudo Games. Watch the official gameplay trailer here.
